notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: Qian Yin, Jinfeng Wang, and Yuming Guo conceived of and designed the study. Qian Yin and Zhoupeng Ren collected and analysed the data. Qian Yin carried out the computations and wrote the paper. Qian Yin, Jinfeng Wang, Yuming Guo, Zhoupeng Ren, and Jie Li contributed to the final version of this paper.
